content.description: This route is located on the 'Cracked Wall', which is uphill from the quarry near where you stop pedalling.  Someone is working around the quarry and has posted no [trespassing] signs, but you can walk around the south face of the [Slabbo] to [access] the Cracked Wall without disturbing  private regions. This climb is the obvious sinuous handcrack on the left hand side of the wall.  The crux is probably stepping into the crack, and you can get a big ass cam in here.  Then [it's] just sweet jammin' to the top.  Walk off the back.
content.protection: Bring a standard S. [Platte] rack of cams, there are opportunities to place big gear although not absolutely necessary.
